title: Suttrum Boomi Mele Lyrics  Idhu Enna Maayam
stanzas: <div>Suttrum Boomi Mele Lyrics  Idhu Enna Maayam

Minmini naan
Minnalum naan
Mazhai naan megam naan

Panithuli naan
pookkalum naan
Pattampoochi naan

Yaaro naan yaaro
Adhai sonnal puriyadho
Uyire kaatraai varuven
Issai naan tharuven

Woa woaho woaho
whoo  woa
Woa woaho woaho
whoo  woa

Suttrum boomi maele
Suttrum paavi naaney
Engum nilavinile ulaviduven

Mutru pulli enthan
Vazhvil endrum illai
Engum parandhiduven
virinthiduven

Oh kuzhandhai kumari
Irandum serndha
Vidaidhaan  enn vayadhu

Oh kaatrum povum
Ondraai kalandha
edaithaan en manadhu

En peru sonnal
Yaar endru theriyum
Maayam seibaval naan maya

Woa woaho woaho
whoo  woa
Woa woaho woaho
whoo  woa

Mutru pulli enthan

virinthiduven

Nadai udai idhai
adhai paarthal
Kadai vizhi kirangum.

Padai munne
kidapathai pole
Manam adhu nadungum

Theruvil naanum
nadanthaal udane
Vibathagum veedhi.

Aankal idhayam
venduvathellam
Enn pol oruthi

Woa woaho woaho

Woa woaho woaho
whoo  woa

virinthiduven

Idam valam dhisai
adhai paarthen
Mugil mazhai tharuma.

Idam porul eval
adhai ketten
Issai paadal varuma

Ilamai vazhiyil
Thadaithan edhu
Nadai podu maname.

Anaiye illaa nadhiyai pole
va va nadappom

Woa woaho woaho
